mapper.select: select order_id, good_id, customer_id, create_time, address_id, remark, ticket_id, coupon_id, score_id from motianlun.orders where order_id = #{orderId}
select order_id, good_id, customer_id, create_time, address_id, remark, ticket_id, coupon_id, score_id from motianlun.orders limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into motianlun.orders(good_id, customer_id, create_time, address_id, remark, ticket_id, coupon_id, score_id) values (#{goodId}, #{customerId}, #{createTime}, #{addressId}, #{remark}, #{ticketId}, #{couponId}, #{scoreId})
